page.title: 15CLAYPOLE SCHOOL-1985-A DAY
page.content: My name is Jamie Lambert and I live in Osterfen Lane, Claypole. I go to Claypole Primary School. I am nine years old and in my third year. I enjoy history and at the moment we are practising "Scrooge" for our play at Christmas. We are going to decorate the classroom in the Victorian style. I also enjoy cookery and made some American "cookies" as part of a topic on America. In clay I have made a fish and also a coil pot which I am giving Grandma for Christmas. My best friend,Paul Summerfield, lives at Dry Doddington. I sometimes go and stay at his farm for the day and he stays at my house. I enjoy playing in the straw stacks and feeding the pigs. My favourite times are firework night, Christmas and the New Year.
